searchDocs.title: Attributes​
searchDocs.content: </> Balance.Attributes: table A table containing the following fields: MaxSwayAngle: number -- Maximum sway angle. SwaySpeed: number -- Speed of the sway. BalanceAmplitude: number -- Amplitude of the balance effect. BalanceSpeed: number -- Speed of the balance effect. Intensity: number -- Intensity of the effect.

searchDocs.title: init​
searchDocs.content: </> Balance:init( CameraController: table-- For Camera Instance ) → () Initializes the Balance effect by binding it to the render step.

searchDocs.title: init​
searchDocs.content: Setup </> CameraController:init() → ( success,-- Indicates if initialization was successful. message-- Error message if initialization fails. ) Initializes the CameraController by setting up the current camera and loading effects.

searchDocs.title: setAttribute​
searchDocs.content: Attribute </> CameraController:setAttribute( effectName: string,-- The name of the effect to modify. keyOrTable: string | table,-- The attribute key or a table of key-value pairs. value: any-- The value to set for the specified key (ignored if keyOrTable is a table). ) → () Sets attributes for a specified effect. Accepts either a key-value pair or a table of key-value pairs.

searchDocs.title: getAttribute​
searchDocs.content: Attribute </> CameraController:getAttribute( effectName: string,-- The name of the effect to query. key: string?key-- The specific attribute key to retrieve (optional). ) → any-- The value of the specified attribute, or a table of all attributes if no key is provided. Retrieves the value of a specified attribute for a given effect. If no key is provided, returns all attributes.

searchDocs.title: new​
searchDocs.content: </> Controls.new() → Controls-- A new instance of the Controls class. Creates a new instance of the Controls class with default key bindings.
